_comment: Created by EFisher on 24/01/2014 17:01:08 using v2.0
title: How many patients are affected by delayed transfers of care and how has this changed?
analysis_commentary: Despite individual monthly fluctuations, the number of patients experiencing a delayed transfer of care appears to have decreased over time from 4,940 in August 2010, to 3, 977 in July 2013. In December each year there appears to be a large decrease in the number of patients with a delayed transfer of care when compared to the previous month.
data_source: NHS England, Delayed transfer of care
